description: Join us for the Creative Corners of Wood Green tour, a journey through the vibrant creative industries of Wood Green. This tour offers a unique opportunity to visit Wood Green’s creative workspaces including ceramics, music, visual arts, and design studios

factsheet.heading: Creative Corners of Wood Green
paragraphs: As we walk through the neighbourhood, you will get an insider's look at the community of artists creatives and entrepreneurs who operate in Wood Green, learn about their projects and gain insights into the innovative practices that contribute to the area’s cultural richness.

Whether you are a local resident, a workspace enthusiast, or simply curious about the creative industries in Wood Green, please join us and experience firsthand how creativity and community come together in this hidden corner of London.
We will meet outside the entrance to Wood Green Library and finish the tour at Blue House Yard in Wood Green.

name: Creative Corners of Wood Green
